NpcWelcome: Do you want to bet me something? Come and join!
You fancy yourself lucky do you? Get back to me when you find yourself pennyless at the bottom of a shallow grave.
Did you come here to feel the adrenalin rushing through your veins? Be careful... gambling can be a curse.
You a gambler? Some find lady luck to be their mistress, while others never find her at all... Which one will you find?
Step right up! Take a chance! Go home rich!
If you still have money in your pocket, you can walk away a winner. Don't forget your real responsibilities.
Do you seek fun and pleasure? Stay for a while and play with me.
You should only try this once. Self control is a must in this place.
